info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fairfield County through 515 PM EDT... At 429 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Newtown, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Danbury, Shelton, Newtown, Trumbull, Monroe, Bethel, Brookfield, Redding, Oxford and Easton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
